content.rendered:
Directed by Jon Watts. Jet Wilkinson. Greg Yaitanes. Zetna Fuentes. Steve Boyum.

Written by Robert Levine. Robert Levine. Robert Levine. Robert Levine. Daphne Olive. Thomas Perry. Thomas Perry. Jonathan E. Steinberg. Jonathan E. Steinberg. Jonathan E. Steinberg. Jonathan E. Steinberg.

Cast  John Lithgow( Harold Harper ) . E.J. Bonilla( Raymond Waters ) . Bill Heck( Young Dan Chase ) . Alia Shawkat( Angela Adams ) . Gbenga Akinnagbe( Julian Carson ) . Leem Lubany( Young Abbey Chase ) . Amy Brenneman( Zoe ) . Hiam Abbass( Abbey Chase ) . Pej Vahdat( Young Faraz Hamzad ) . Echo Kellum( Mike ) . Milo Stein( Henry Harper ) . Kenneth Mitchell( Joe ) . Jessica Harper( Cheryl Harper ) . Joel Grey( Morgan Bote ) . Noor Razooky( Young Khadija ) . Andrew Perez( Young Suleyman Pavlovich ) . Rowena King( Nina Kruger ) . Faran Tahir( Rahmani ) . Christopher Redman( Young Harold Harper ) . Tai Bennett( Marty ) . Jordan Bridges( Zachary ) . Iman Nazemzadeh( Wahid ) . Chris Gann( Agent Reynolds ) . Jennifer Field( FBI Receptionist ) . Graham Scott Littlefield( Special Agent in Mobile Ops Center ) . Marcel Bridges( Stuart ) . Andrei Runtso( Bodyguard #7 ) . Nelson Franklin( Dr. Howard ) . Herbert Russell( Officer Stevenson ) . Rade Serbedzija( Old Suleyman Pavlovich ) . Navid Negahban( Faraz Hamzad ) . Jeff Elam( Officer Richmond ) . Jessica Parker Kennedy( Woman at Bus Stop ) . Shawna Gentry( Truck Stop Waitress ) . Rich Ting( Agent Lam ) . Domin/epique Domin/epgo( Restaurant Hostess ) . Timothy Stack( CIA Chief ) . Jacqueline Antaramian( Old Woman ) . Juan Francisco Villa( Restaurant Waiter ) . R.C. Ormond( Officer #1 ) . Mike Mukatis( Muffin Man ) . Ryan Gray( Roadblock Officer #2 ) . Michaela Rose Cortez( Young Emily ) . Shari Vasseghi( Old Woman #1 ) . Shawn Mousavi( Hamzad Dresser ) . David Lowe( Harper’s Driver ) . Faruk Amireh( Bartender ) . Richard Assad( Baggage Handler ) . Naina Michaud( Flight Attendant ) . Trenton Rostedt( Pavlovich’s Bodyguard #1 ) . Brock Pierce( Russian Sentry #2 ) . Steven Busby( Russian Sentry #1 ) . Brahim Rachiki( Security Supervisor ) . Stephen D’Angelo( Private Security Guy ) . Sean Fenton( House Manager ) . Anthony Wahba( Street Vendor ) . Mezi Atwood( CIA Agent (uncredited) ) . David Paul Olsen( Plain Clothes Cop (uncredited) ) . David Moskowitz( Moroccan Party Guest (uncredited) ) . Evan Shafran( Moroccan Bank Customer (uncredited) ) . Vincent Lionetti( Appliance Store Salesman (uncredited) ) . Christine Heneise( Moroccan Villager (uncredited) ) . Sarkis Ninos( Moroccan Terrorist (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Jeff Bridges. Bridget Greene. Ann Johnson. Robert Levine. Graham Scott Littlefield. Warren Littlefield. Allen Marshall Palmer. Judd Rea. David L. Schiff. Dan Shotz. Jonathan E. Steinberg. Jon Watts. Lukas Ettlin. Adam Cozad. Leigh Dana Jackson. Jet Wilkinson. Zoe Neary.

Production 20th Television. Fox 21 Television Studios. Fresh Bacon Media.

Creator Robert Levine. Jonathan E. Steinberg.

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 8

Status OnGoing (2022–)
